name: Wild Animal Smash City Attack
description:
Here is your chance to rampage through the wild city in hopes of conducting an animal attack that will be remembered for ages!!! Your wrath and reign will forever circulate amongst the territory of angry animals all that are trying to cause destruction!! You must be the one to fulfill the conquest and give them a wild city animal attack they will remember for the rest of their creature lives!!
There are but dozens of creatures circulating around to gain their victory, out of which those include the horrifying and the powerful, dinosaur simulator, the hefty and powerful gorilla simulator, and the conqueror of all things that send chills down your spine, the living, breathing, unstoppable, havoc erupting, fire breathing dragon simulator!!!
All the mighty, unbeatable, heroic and invincible monsters have gathered in the wild city for some fun as the ultimate and unforgiving smasher of all things around!!! This simulation brings with itself the best quality of graphics and game play which showcases the perfect kind of destruction that a smasher game needs!!!
The joy of such monster games is the fact that it has all the kinds of variety of angry animals that can cause the best and the most entertaining wild rampage!! Who can beat the dinosaur jungle simulator, who can challenge the t rex simulator, who can fight against the powerful gorilla, and must we absolutely not forget the dragon simulator!!!
Everything is their kingdom, more enemies, wild angry animals will be present in the wild city and the competition of these monsters is with everything!! Other animals, the city itself, buildings, everything is meant to be conquered by these wild rampage smasher animals!!!
With its wrath the t rex simulator can chase everything and anything in his way!!! With his super strength the gorilla simulator can smash everything and crush anything with that power of his after all it is the animal attack as a simulator game we’re looking at!!! And finally, the fierce and scary, fire breathing dragon is enough to cause a valley of chills down the enemies and everyone who comes in the way!!!
Smashing and destruction is what they were made for, what they live for!!! Help the smasher live up to their name!!! They rule this wild city kingdom now!! So, expect a great havoc from them!!!
The city is the environment where all the destruction is set to take place!!
Just as the game sounds, the game play is just as exciting and fun to play!!! The game provides with easy to use controls which help your angry animals to move around with help of the smooth joystick!! It is also accompanied by a navigation map which helps you locate the target on point!!!
Similarly, all the target-based tasks will also be time-based…!!! So, they must be performed in the given time!! Attacking options and controls are also on screen!! Which will help in punching, hitting, smashing, breathing fire, destroying!!
------ HOW TO PLAY THE WILD ANIMAL SMASH CITY ATTACK GAME ------
• Start game
• Choose the rampage city animal
• Follow the navigation to the target
• Perform target in the given time
• Use on screen controls to reach till the target
• Use on screen controls to cause the animal attack
• Play all levels similarly

------ FEATURES OF THE WILD ANIMAL SMASH CITY ATTACK GAME ------
• Multiple game play levels
• Multiple angry animal simulators
• Animals with versatile features
• 3D simulation
• HD graphics
• On screen controls
• Realistic city environment
